description: Errors related to the system (back-end, broker, database, ...).
Errors related to the network, for example, when communicating between microservices, or from app to the backend.
Errors related to the data format, for example, when a place order payload format is wrong.
Errors related security, for example, when a user tries to access a resource without having permissions.
Errors related to third party components, for example when occuring in a library.
